English text: Spirits produced in the past 3 months
Welsh text: Gwirodydd a gynhyrchwyd yn ystod y 3 mis diwethaf

English text: Tell us about the spirits you have produced from raw ingredients
Welsh text: Rhoi gwybod i ni am y gwirodydd rydych wedi’u cynhyrchu o gynhwysion amrwd

English text: You do not need to tell us about any alcoholic products produced from base alcohol made elsewhere (for example if you rectify or compound).
Welsh text: Nid oes angen i chi roi gwybod i ni am unrhyw gynhyrchion alcoholaidd a gynhyrchwyd o alcohol sylfaenol a wnaed rywle eraill (er enghraifft os ydych chi’n eu puro neu’n eu cymysgu).

English text: You do need to tell us if you have made:
Welsh text: Mae angen i chi roi gwybod i ni os ydych wedi gwneud:

English text: malt spirits or grain spirits
Welsh text: gwirodydd brag neu wirodydd grawn

English text: neutral spirits of agricultural or industrial origin
Welsh text: gwirodydd niwtral o darddiad amaethyddol neu ddiwydiannol

English text: spirits produced from beer, wine or made-wine or from cider or perry
Welsh text: gwirodydd sydd wedi’u cynhyrchu o gwrw, o win neu win a wnaed, neu o seidr neu berai

English text: any other spirits made from raw ingredients
Welsh text: unrhyw wirodydd eraill sydd wedi’u gwneud o gynhwysion amrwd

English text: You will also need to tell us how much spirits you made in this period in total.
Welsh text: Bydd angen i chi hefyd roi gwybod i ni beth oedd cyfanswm y gwirodydd a wnaethoch yn ystod y cyfnod hwn.

English text: If you made Scotch whisky or Irish whiskey you will need to tell us how much.
Welsh text: Os gwnaethoch wisgi Albanaidd neu wisgi Gwyddelig, bydd angen i chi roi gwybod i ni faint a wnaethoch.

English text: Your answers in this section will not change your duty calculation.
Welsh text: Ni fydd eich atebion yn yr adran hon yn newid eich cyfrifiad tollau.

English text: Have you made any spirits from raw ingredients in the past 3 months?
Welsh text: A ydych chi wedi gwneud unrhyw wirodydd o gynhwysion amrwd yn ystod y 3 mis diwethaf?

English text: Yes
Welsh text: Iawn

English text: No
Welsh text: Na

English text: Save and continue
Welsh text: Cadw a pharhau

English text: Select yes if you have made any spirits from raw ingredients in the past 3 months
Welsh text: Dewiswch ‘Iawn’ os ydych chi wedi gwneud unrhyw wirodydd o gynhwysion amrwd yn ystod y 3 mis diwethaf

English text: What is the total of all spirits taken this quarter?
Welsh text: Beth yw cyfanswm yr holl wirodydd sydd wedi’u cymryd yn ystod y chwarter hwn?
Comments: What does "taken" mean in this context, please? Is it the same as "produced"?

English text: Regarding feints
Welsh text: Ynglŷn â ffeintiau

English text: Feints are the ‘foreshots’ or ‘heads’ and ‘feints’ or ‘tails’ that are conveyed into a feints receiver. View the Spirits Production Manual for more information (opens in a new window)
Welsh text: Ffeintiau yw’r ‘blaensiotiau’ (neu ‘pennau’) a’r ‘ffeintiau’ (neu ‘cynffonnau’) sy’n cael eu rhoi i mewn i dderbynnydd ffeintiau. Darllenwch y Llawlyfr Cynhyrchu Gwirodydd am ragor o wybodaeth (yn agor ffenestr newydd)
Comments:
Just wanted to check whether "Feints are the…feints" is correct.

Also, please let us know what URL will be used in the English version, and we can provide the equivalent Welsh URL. Thank you!

English text: In telling us about the spirits you have produced:
Welsh text: Wrth roi gwybod i ni am y gwirodydd rydych wedi’u cynhyrchu:

English text: include feints remaining at the end of the current period
Welsh text: dylech gynnwys ffeintiau sy’n weddill ar ddiwedd y cyfnod presennol

English text: do not include feints remaining at the end of the previous period
Welsh text: peidiwch â chynnwys ffeintiau sy’n weddill ar ddiwedd y cyfnod blaenorol

English text: Total volume of all spirits taken
Welsh text: Cyfanswm cyfaint yr holl wirodydd sydd wedi’u cymryd

English text: In litres of pure alcohol, up to 2 decimal places
Welsh text: Nodwch y litrau o alcohol pur, hyd at 2 le degol
Comments: Should this be "to 4" instead of "up to 2", since we are dealing with pure alcohol? Or should "of pure alcohol" be removed from this item?

English text: Enter the total volume of spirits taken in litres of pure alcohol
Welsh text: Nodwch gyfanswm cyfaint y gwirodydd sydd wedi’u cymryd, mewn litrau o alcohol pur

English text: Total volume of spirits must be a number
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i gyfanswm cyfaint y gwirodydd fod yn rhif

English text: Total volume of spirits must be less than 1 billion litres
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i gyfanswm cyfaint y gwirodydd fod yn llai nag 1 biliwn o litrau

English text: Total volume of spirits must be more than 0.00 litres
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i gyfanswm cyfaint y gwirodydd fod yn fwy na 0.00 o litrau

English text: Total volume of spirits must be a number up to 2 decimal places
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i gyfanswm cyfaint y gwirodydd fod yn rhif sy’n cynnwys hyd at 2 le degol

English text: How much Scotch Whisky and Irish Whiskey have you produced?
Welsh text: Faint o wisgi Albanaidd a wisgi Gwyddelig rydych chi wedi’i gynhyrchu?

English text: Scotch Whisky
Welsh text: Wisgi Albanaidd

English text: In litres of pure alcohol, up to 2 decimal places. Enter 0 if none.
Welsh text: Nodwch y litrau o alcohol pur, hyd at 2 le degol. Nodwch 0 os nad yw hyn yn berthnasol.
Comments: Should this be "to 4" instead of "up to 2", since we are dealing with pure alcohol? Or should "of pure alcohol" be removed?

English text: Irish Whiskey
Welsh text: Wisgi Gwyddelig

English text: In litres of pure alcohol, up to 2 decimal places. Enter 0 if none.
Welsh text: Nodwch y litrau o alcohol pur, hyd at 2 le degol. Nodwch 0 os nad yw hyn yn berthnasol.
Comments: Should this be "to 4" instead of "up to 2", since we are dealing with pure alcohol? Or should "of pure alcohol" be removed?

English text: Enter the volume of Scotch Whisky produced
Welsh text: Nodwch gyfaint y wisgi Albanaidd a gynhyrchwyd

English text: Scotch Whisky must be a number
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’r ateb ar gyfer Wisgi Albanaidd fod yn rhif

English text: Scotch Whisky must be less than 1 billion litres
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’r ateb ar gyfer Wisgi Albanaidd fod yn llai nag 1 biliwn o litrau

English text: Scotch Whisky must be zero or higher
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’r ateb ar gyfer Wisgi Albanaidd fod yn sero neu’n uwch

English text: Scotch Whisky must be a number up to 2 decimal places
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’r ateb ar gyfer Wisgi Albanaidd fod yn rhif sy’n cynnwys hyd at 2 le degol

English text: Enter the volume of Irish Whiskey produced
Welsh text: Nodwch gyfaint y wisgi Gwyddelig a gynhyrchwyd

English text: Irish Whiskey must be less than 1 billion litres
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’r ateb ar gyfer Wisgi Gwyddelig fod yn llai nag 1 biliwn o litrau

English text: Irish Whiskey must be a number up to 2 decimal places
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’r ateb ar gyfer Wisgi Gwyddelig fod yn rhif sy’n cynnwys hyd at 2 le degol

English text: Irish Whiskey must be zero or higher
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’r ateb ar gyfer Wisgi Gwyddelig fod yn sero neu’n uwch

English text: Irish Whiskey must be a number
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’r ateb ar gyfer Wisgi Gwyddelig fod yn rhif

English text: Which of these spirits have you produced?
Welsh text: Pa rai o’r gwirodydd hyn rydych chi wedi’u cynhyrchu?

English text: Select all you have produced in the past 3 month
Welsh text: Dewiswch bopeth rydych chi wedi’i gynhyrchu yn ystod y 3 mis diwethaf
Comments: We've translated "months" to match the screenshot, instead of "month"

English text: Malt spirits
Welsh text: Gwirodydd brag

English text: Grain spirits
Welsh text: Gwirodydd grawn

English text: Neutral spirits of agricultural origin
Welsh text: Gwirodydd niwtral o darddiad amaethyddol

English text: Neutral spirits of industrial origin
Welsh text: Gwirodydd niwtral o darddiad diwydiannol

English text: Spirits produced from beer
Welsh text: Gwirodydd sydd wedi’u cynhyrchu o gwrw

English text: Spirits produced from wine or made-wine
Welsh text: Gwirodydd sydd wedi’u cynhyrchu o win neu win a wnaed

English text: Spirits produced from cider or perry
Welsh text: Gwirodydd sydd wedi’u cynhyrchu o seidr neu berai

English text: Other spirits
Welsh text: Gwirodydd eraill

English text: Select the spirits you have produced
Welsh text: Dewiswch y gwirodydd rydych chi wedi’u cynhyrchu

English text: Which other types of spirits have you produced?
Welsh text: Pa fathau eraill o wirodydd rydych chi wedi’u cynhyrchu?

English text: You have [150] characters remaining
Welsh text: Mae gennych [150] o gymeriadau yn weddill

English text: Enter the other types of spirits you have produced
Welsh text: Nodwch y mathau eraill o wirodydd rydych chi wedi’u cynhyrchu

English text: Other types of spirits you have produced must be 150 characters or less
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’r mathau eraill o wirodydd rydych chi wedi’u cynhyrchu fod yn 150 o gymeriadau neu lai

English text: Check your answers
Welsh text: Gwirio’ch atebion

English text: Spirits you've produced
Welsh text: Gwirodydd rydych chi wedi’u cynhyrchu

English text: Total of all spirits
Welsh text: Cyfanswm yr holl wirodydd

English text: litres of pure alcohol
Welsh text: o litrau o alcohol pur

English text: Other spirits produced
Welsh text: Gwirodydd eraill a gynhyrchwyd

English text: Change[ the total volume of spirits you made this quarter (Spirits you’ve produced)]
Welsh text: Newid[ cyfanswm cyfaint y gwirodydd a wnaethoch yn ystod y chwarter hwn (Gwirodydd rydych chi wedi’u cynhyrchu)]

English text: Change[ scotch whisky (Spirits you’ve produced)]
Welsh text: Newid[ wisgi Albanaidd (Gwirodydd rydych chi wedi’u cynhyrchu)]

English text: Change[ irish whiskey (Spirits you’ve produced)]
Welsh text: Newid[ wisgi Gwyddelig (Gwirodydd rydych chi wedi’u cynhyrchu)]

English text: Change[ which of these spirits you have made (Spirits you’ve produced)]
Welsh text: Newid[ pa rai o’r gwirodydd hyn rydych chi wedi’u gwneud (Gwirodydd rydych chi wedi’u cynhyrchu)]

English text: Change[ what other types of spirits have you produced this quarter (Spirits you’ve produced)]
Welsh text: Newid[ pa fathau eraill o wirodydd rydych chi wedi’u cynhyrchu yn ystod y chwarter hwn (Gwirodydd rydych chi wedi’u cynhyrchu)]
